website_summaries.verdict: Provides deep muscle stimulation and therapy for quick relief.
pros: USB recharging wire is highly convenient
Unit offers lots of modes and levels of strength

customer_reviews.title: Cant not praise this enough! Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: I threw out my back awhile ago and found out I have a pinched nerve and my spine is twisted. I couldn't move. I went to the chiropractor and he had a tens machine that he used it worked very well. Went to my brothers he has a really bad back and he showed me his tens machine. I didn't know you could purchase one. I thought u had to be a doctor or something. This machine is a absolute god send!! Whenever my back acts up I put it on n it instantly takes the pain away! The charge lasts forever and i love it has so many different settings! I swear by this thing!
customer_reviews.author: Jacob

customer_reviews.title: I was having back spasms for 3 weeks. I ...
customer_reviews.text: I was having back spasms for 3 weeks. I tried muscle relaxers and pain pills from the doctor, but the ONLY thing that could make the pain go away was this TENS unit I borrowed from my chiropractor. It was less than half the price of a unit I almost bought in Walgreens and an added bonus is that it is rechargeable!This thing is magical if you have muscle pain!
customer_reviews.author: Larry Atkinson

customer_reviews.title: The greatest drawback, and this is true with all tens ...
customer_reviews.text: A well made tens unit can be a godsend to those of us with back pain. The controls of this unit were a little difficult to go through to see which settings would be of most benefit but once learned they wer ok. Most people will not use many of the settings available. The greatest drawback, and this is true with all tens units, is that it is difficult to place the pads in the correct positions on your own back. Lower back fine but help is needed for mid and upper back.
customer_reviews.author: Craig

customer_reviews.title: Great for sciatic back pain.
customer_reviews.text: Sciatic pain in my back and hip would wake me every night and keep me awake for several hours. My physical therapist suggested I purchase a Tems unit and I am so grateful I did. This unit is great. I can attach the pads before bed and when I am awakened, I just turn the unit on and am back asleep in minutes. It is very small and lightweight. I am very satisfied with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Janet

customer_reviews.title: Great! So many mode options to help w/ stress
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Can’t believe how many modes are available & pads are included. Used it on multiple friends & family and almost all of them have purchased one since. They & myself were a little nervous at first but it’s so easy to control the intensity. I got it to help with stress & anxiety and really see a difference. Try to use it for 10-20 min everyday. Only downside is that the chart to show points on body to use it is in Chinese. I had to google another chart & print that to use.
customer_reviews.author: tyarber

customer_reviews.title: Pain relief in a great small powerful unit .
customer_reviews.text: Use this product for low back and hip pain . Really like it . It’s easy to use and is very powerful . Works great . Bought extra gel pads and a gel to use on the pads . I had received the same treatment from my chiropractor. Got my own and LOVE THE RESULTS. Can use whenever you like . Great buy. ❤️
customer_reviews.author: DEBI G

customer_reviews.title: It broke after 3 weeks
customer_reviews.text: It worked well for about 3 weeks. Then one outlet (A) of the two started to deliver short but severe and sharp zaps. I could not change the intensity, it was on the lowest setting; it was intermittent but very disturbing and thus rendered useless. I could still use outlet (B), but this was not as nice as using all 4 pads for therapy. The return period was over unfortunately. It was inexpensive but I would not purchase another one. I guess you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: CJ

customer_reviews.title: Great price, effective and easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: Super sleek small Ten's unit that comes packed with power for relief of your aches and pains. I love that it is rechargeable. It is easy to use and comes with multiple attachments and gel pads to attach.I wish there was a way to control the speed of the pulses but still love this. Each electrode has 2 wires that split into two but it seems that only one side works at a time. I will continue to test this as it may be user error.Some of the directions are in Chinese which makes it hard to really comprehend use. Otherwise, plug and play sorta device which is user friendly.
customer_reviews.author: Tuan Vo

customer_reviews.title: Great value and it works
customer_reviews.text: Best 30$ I have ever spent. I had a car accident so now I'm in constant lower back pain and neck pain. I ran out of chiropractor $ so decided to buy my own machine to ease my pain and this lil thing works. Takes a lil time to get it to the right pulse for my needs but it depend helps. Now I can have chiropractor sessions at home instead. Great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Nana

customer_reviews.title: Portable pain relief
customer_reviews.text: This little machine works the same way as the stationary electric stim machine at my son’s physical therapy. With three shoulder surgeries and a back injury, he is finding this product super helpful for loosening tight muscles and pain relief. So good he is buying another one for his big brother. Thanks for a great product!
customer_reviews.author: M. Ball

customer_reviews.title: Great for pain management
customer_reviews.text: I went to PT assist with a pain on my back side. I had one of the therapists use the simulator and I helped ease my pain. I use it when I am cleaning around the house. They only downfall are the pads. They are not as sticky as I wish they would be. Other than that, I use it all the time when I am watching tv, cooking or cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: Katrine Mendivil

customer_reviews.title: Totally worth it!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic little machine. Definitely worth the money.. I bought one for $60 that aleve males and I thought that one was good this one puts that one to shame.. The pads are super sticky and stay on, there are so many different combinations you can do and the power is more than i could ever handle on the highest level. Happy customer here!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Trujillo

customer_reviews.title: Way too strong, can’t lower it anymore.
customer_reviews.text: Even at the lowest setting this product is WAY too strong. I’ve had other TENS units before and this is ridiculous. I have it at the lowest setting, on my shoulder, and have grossly visible large muscle spasms in any mode. It won’t go any lower. Is this defective???
customer_reviews.author: Steven Jordan K

customer_reviews.title: Best money I have ever spent
customer_reviews.text: I just received my Tens Unit and couldn't wait to plug it in. WOW!!! Best money I have ever spent. It came on time, beautifully packaged, safe and secure. I honestly and truly can say, it works. I watched the little video that was online, which make it easy to use as soon as it came. I would recommend this to anyone that has pain. Saves on going to the chiropractor.
customer_reviews.author: Sowlady

customer_reviews.title: Great item
customer_reviews.text: Excellent unit. Several options to pick from. They offer a chart, but it is in Chinese(?), but still self explanatory because of the pictures. It comes with 2 electrodes that will hold 2 pads each, so you can use 4 pads at once. You can pick the style of stimulus, how intense, and set the timer for up to an hour. It come with a dozen pads and aa little pouch to carry it all in. It's great!
customer_reviews.author: Foothill Woman

customer_reviews.title: Recommended by someone
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. Works really well and the price was really good. The only negative thing I have to say is there is two sets of wires and one of them doesn't seem to work but it may be that I just don't know how to use it. It actually has four connections and I've never seen one with four connections.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie Atkins

customer_reviews.title: I'm in love with your product
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love to use this product. The battery life is absolutely amazing. I have alot of different settings to choose from, that helps with different levels of pain. The snaps are very strong and do not come undone.. I really like that. I like how slim and light the TENS unit is. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: sue coulter

customer_reviews.title: Great way to be introduced to TENS Therapy without paying an arm and a leg
customer_reviews.text: So many tens machines are complicated, big and confusing. This is small, useable and well priced.
customer_reviews.author: Grace

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this product because I have back problems and thought it would help me but it is very small and haven't been able to get it to work. Disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: RoseAlonzo

customer_reviews.title: It Works as Advertised
customer_reviews.text: It's kind of strange... My companion needed it for her neck, but said she wasn't feeling anything, turns out she only had on one of the pads, and you need at least two.... I'd recommend it not be used near your internal organs (kidneys, bladder), but it's good on muscles.
customer_reviews.author: Auntie-Nanuuq

customer_reviews.title: this will be great gift for my mom because her leg and knees ...
customer_reviews.text: this will be great gift for my mom because her leg and knees feel painful while walking. This device should help her feel better. It looks pretty nice and unquiet.
customer_reviews.author: Eda M. Castro

customer_reviews.title: Amazing power
customer_reviews.text: amazing power for such a small inexpensive unit. Trying to figure out all the different function modes is difficult. Not very good instructions.
customer_reviews.author: nmsumike98

customer_reviews.title: Nice product but poor quality
customer_reviews.text: I liked it the first 5 times I used it. Then I didn't need it for 2 months and it would not turn on. It was fully charged. Since it was past the 30 day warrante period it could not be returned. A waste of $30. Nice features but poor product.
customer_reviews.author: Marcia Hess

customer_reviews.title: Husband loves this!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Husband loves this!!!! Got it for him to relax his muscles after a workout but instead, he is using it as a second workout for his abs. Turns up the intensity, watches the muscles work and is already feeling and seeing a difference.
customer_reviews.author: Lizzie

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I love the unit's "massage"options and lead options. It works great on back strain and muscle tightness. The downside is the menu is a little weird to use it just cycles through the A and B option which means shoving it in a pocket and walking while using it can mean it suddenly cycles to another option or strength. It's totally worth what I paid for it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Is as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Only thing I took a star away for was because message A and B are being used at the same time it's hard and near imposable to start them exactly at the same time and the offset is annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and powerful
customer_reviews.text: My husband suffers from gout attacks in his foot; this little "shocking" machine helps him through the attacks; he states that it makes the pain more bearable. It is easy to use and really powerful.
customer_reviews.author: Simone K.

customer_reviews.title: Muscle Relief
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I needed. Multiple pads, with different sizes and plenty of settings. Feels just like what my chiropractor uses.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea

customer_reviews.title: Small and helpful
customer_reviews.text: Nice affordable TENS unit to help relieve some pain and muscle tightness.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Newman

customer_reviews.title: At 1/3 the price of others - great buy!
customer_reviews.text: I was using a TENS unit that someone let me borrow. They paid $100 for it and it doesn't have as many setting as this one. Otherwise they almost identical. So at 1/3 the price, I consider this a great buy and so far, worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: DaveInPhx

customer_reviews.title: A must have for joint pain
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Works like a charm to take my shoulder pain out. I even forgot I had shoulder pain, till this request to review came up. Awesome product. Does its job.
customer_reviews.author: sharon prather

customer_reviews.title: It is the only thing that works in my shoulders ...
customer_reviews.text: It is the only thing that works in my shoulders, I went to the chinese guys in the mall and he was litteraly over my sholders but i did not feel anything, he recomended my this kind of gadget.
customer_reviews.author: Jose

customer_reviews.title: Charge up
customer_reviews.text: Nice item. Well made & good value. Great item. Actually works
customer_reviews.author: Chris m

customer_reviews.title: This is my second unit.
customer_reviews.text: The first one I paid lot more for and this one is so much better.... By from online and not at home shows....
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Damschen

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn't buy again
customer_reviews.text: Half of the display stopped working within 20 min of using it. It still worked but you couldn't see the selection. Was hoping it worked better
customer_reviews.author: B. T. Milam

customer_reviews.title: Works with very minor glitches that require wiggling a bit
customer_reviews.text: It works pretty well most of the time, sometimes I have to wiggle with the connectors in the ports to get both pads to work. But beyond that it works well.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay Sheffield

customer_reviews.title: Works Great and Good Price!
customer_reviews.text: I love it! Works so much better than I'd expected. After trying a couple others in the same price range or higher, this has has good balance of effectiveness and user friendliness. Also, the build quality is quite decent.
customer_reviews.author: Uncoolio

customer_reviews.title: A must have
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time in excellent shape.easy to use and works great use it everyday to relieve pain
customer_reviews.author: michelle giddings

customer_reviews.title: Good little gadget.
customer_reviews.text: It's easy to understand and use. I experience frequent aches and pains on my back and lower back and I find it relaxing and I enjoyed using this product. Good little gadget, came with everything i needed.
customer_reviews.author: Casey Bartschi

customer_reviews.title: very small but easy to handle and program.
customer_reviews.text: The only thing I would have liked is a case to put all off the accessories and the unit in. This would be value added to me if a case was provided with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Needs a mode to keep it on. Every mode pulses with starts and stops.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Bojangles

customer_reviews.title: It really works!
customer_reviews.text: Such a fantastic product. Works very well and throughly enjoy the detailed video on this page of how to use it. Highly recommend it
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Gallardo

customer_reviews.title: Nice gift
customer_reviews.text: I brought this for my dad, he usually has back pain issue. He loved it after first trying. It's portable and small, easy to set up and use, very convenience even if going for a travel. The most important thing is it really helps on the pain, it can relax muscles.
customer_reviews.author: SHANNY

customer_reviews.title: Great Product! Fair Price!
customer_reviews.text: We just purchased this a few weeks ago and are already reaping the rewards. The unit can do up to 6 points at once if you use both the A and B ports. There are 16 different modes and the level of stimulation is adjustable from a weak pulse to a powerful one. We are so glad we have this now.
customer_reviews.author: Constance Spano

customer_reviews.title: GREAT TENS UNIT
customer_reviews.text: THIS UNIT DOES THE TRICK. Small, GREAT stimulation, I would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Deb H.

customer_reviews.title: Lifesaver
customer_reviews.text: The best purchase we have made all year. This has helped my husband tremendously with his back muscle pain. Lifesaver
customer_reviews.author: jeannie phipps

customer_reviews.title: Hard to read the charts that came with it.
customer_reviews.text: works great but the charts could be easier to read
customer_reviews.author: BrandedX

customer_reviews.title: Awesome little machine
customer_reviews.text: I suffer from severely bad shoulder and neck pain, this is a god send after a long day. Sometimes I wear it through my work shift.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice TENS unit and it's rechargable and doesn't need batteries like others!!
customer_reviews.text: Very good!!! I broke my TENS unit and I bought these and I thought the that it was wonderful!! Helped ease my chronic back pain! I love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Terry Namingha

customer_reviews.title: Recently got into an accident, try this kind product ...
customer_reviews.text: Recently got into an accident, try this kind product in Dr. Office, I bought one for my self. Works as it should be, but even stronger. Help with my pain.
customer_reviews.author: JoR

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for a friend that uses a tens unit frequently for back pain, the one he had finally quit, he was hesitant to try a different brand. Well he is very happy with this one and all the setting options.
customer_reviews.author: keelee

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff
customer_reviews.text: Powerful massager... I don’t even use it on its highest setting and get great results
customer_reviews.author: khyra

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work after using it a couple times.
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased and returned two of these units. I have just received a third unit, used it twice and it now isn't working. Just like the first two.
customer_reviews.author: Carol McMahon

customer_reviews.title: Looks like it was a pretty quality unit if it would ...
customer_reviews.text: Looks like it was a pretty quality unit if it would turn on. I returned the unit because the on/off switch was all sloppy, like it wasn’t put together properly, it moved around without even touching it, so never clicked on or off. I will give another shot to hopefully get one that works because of price and having a lot of positive reviews. I do understand that things happen
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Little but mighty
customer_reviews.text: works great love that it recharges lot of power packed in that little thing careful you don't turn into high definitely relaxes the muscles
customer_reviews.author: Mikomi-1

customer_reviews.title: Comfort!
customer_reviews.text: I had neck surgery back Aug 2018 I still have discomfort etc. I go to the chiropractor about twice a week until I bought my tens unit. I have been so pleased. It is convenient and helps me to all extreme. Wise choice to buy.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle German

customer_reviews.title: I think I’m at the PT! No, it’s my mini massager!
customer_reviews.text: I love how easy this unit is to use and it does a great job relieving some aches and pains from arthritis and a shoulder condition I have.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome little massager
customer_reviews.text: Always sitting in the office my shoulder heart when I am typing l. This little massager is so cool. It's very small and I just use it while I am working.
customer_reviews.author: joyce jj

customer_reviews.title: This is a nice little Tens unit
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice little Tens unit. I use it almost daily, gives good relief when I have air muscles. Well worthy the money.

customer_reviews.title: Nice buy
customer_reviews.text: Not a bad little unit. Very powerful pulsation. I’m impressed

customer_reviews.title: Works well, I suffer from lower back issues and ...
customer_reviews.text: Works well, I suffer from lower back issues and it helps me to relax. I have also tryed it on a sore shoulder and with in a few hours, the pain was gone.
customer_reviews.author: Fred

customer_reviews.title: Amazing device
customer_reviews.text: I gave it to my best friend She loved it so much, it was recommended to my dad by a physiotherapist

customer_reviews.title: Buy this!
customer_reviews.text: This is great! Surprising very powerful and helped With my shoulder pain. The price is phenomenal for this product!
customer_reviews.author: Julie Camp

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Took me 1 minute to figure it out. Works very well.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Chlopik

customer_reviews.title: Handy personal TENS unit
customer_reviews.text: This is a compact unit that is easy to use and very effective for pain relief. I am using it mainly (for now) for injured leg muscle. It is handy and I love the many modes, strengths and good sticky pads.
customer_reviews.author: David M.

customer_reviews.title: Hard to use.
customer_reviews.text: Hard to use. Too bad I took so long and couldn’t return it. Save your time and money. Not worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Ana

customer_reviews.title: Thanks to this device. I use it at least ...
customer_reviews.text: Thanks to this device. I use it at least once a week additional to my regular physical therapy visit . Million thanks!

customer_reviews.title: Does not do what it says
customer_reviews.text: Made me jolt and jump felt like they were jumping my heart. Wont use it again
customer_reviews.author: Rarerare

customer_reviews.title: Massages the pain away
customer_reviews.text: Used this item for bursitis in my shoulder. It works every time. This ltitle machine works wonders.

customer_reviews.title: Works great.
customer_reviews.text: Product works very well and they give you lots of extra pads. Definitely recommend this item.

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: IT WORKS OK. I HAVE VERY TIGHT MUSCLES FROM TREMORS.

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!! Must try
customer_reviews.text: I‘ve used it for 3 days 2 times a day,and I love this unit.I injured my shoulder while working out and Decided to try this unit,so far it’s been a great help for pain relief.Easy to use.The shipping was super fast 👍
customer_reviews.author: rebecca moreno

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Item works great really help my fiance out the pads are not all that great at re sticking after one use

customer_reviews.text: this item do what he is intend to do, have a variety of places to use ans will take your pain away

customer_reviews.text: Great product with lots of settings. Works great for minor muscle aches and tension.

customer_reviews.text: I have recently purchased this product and totally satisfied. Its very handy with many features. There are many modes of vibrations to choose. Battery life is great.

product_meta.title: 2020 Latest Upgrade Version Dual Channel Rechargeable TENS Unit Muscle Stimulator Electronic Pulse Massager with 16 Modes and 12 Pads Portable Smart Electro Pain Relief Machine
product_meta.description:
Our advantage:
The loverbeby Muscle Stimulator have 16 preprogrammed massage mode,Created by professionals using body simulation technology, bionic technology, bio-electric technology and intelligent microcomputer control technology to penetrate muscle groups deeper than and more effectively,Choose between a diverse range of offerings from Knocking, Acupuncture, Abdominal, Brain, Feet, Ear, Kneading, Shiatsu, Vibration, Rubbing and more with the simple touch of a button.20 levels of strength adjustable by increasing or decreasing steadily.Helps in easing pain, tiredness, promotes blood circulation, recuperates spleen and stomach, enhances immunity, improves sleep quality and activate circulation for pain relief.

Product Features: 
Rechargeable internal lithium battery 
Adjustable Intensity 
Easy to Read Display 
Out-Of-Box Ready 
Multiple Massaging Modes 

Included in your purchase: 
Tens unit 
12x Electrode Pads 
2x Electrode Cables 
1x USB battery Charger 
1x Mini USB Cable 
1x Wire Roller/Pad Holder 

Maintenance and Care: 
1. When you are finished using the TENS device, turn it off and take off the pads. Store the unit in a cool,dry place until next use. 
2. After usage, please cover the pads with the included pads holders / protective film and put them back in the included pouch. Applying a few drops water before and after usage will increase the longevity of the pads. 
3. Charge the unit at least every 3 month in event it is not used regularly. You can also charge the unit with the included wall charger or directly from your computer using the included USB cable.
feature_bullets: 1. Highly ensured for optimal safety when getting fast relief through certifications, further protects you from harmful additives and consumption of prescription medication

2.16 preprogrammed massage mode and 20 levels of strength adjustable,Choose between a diverse range of offerings from Knocking, Acupuncture, Abdominal, Brain, Feet, Ear, Kneading, Shiatsu, Vibration, Rubbing and more with the simple touch of a button

3.Simultaneous dual output design, 12 pcs of self adhesive conductive reusable pads , replaceable self-adhesive conductive gel pads, not necessary to use any cream and gel together,allows 6 pads to be applied to the two different targeted areas at the same time.

4.Built in rechargeable lithium battery-- up to 10 hours of continuous use. It can be connected to wall unit or computer USB port to charge.Built in timer from 10 to 60 minutes,default timer: 20 minutes. When time is due, it is automatically shut off.

5.30 day no hassle money back guarantee and 1 year warranty for electronic massager muscle stimulator, if you have any question, please contact our customer service for help. You can find our customer service email in the box.
